A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Exceeded my expectations after the first one being the same script essentially as episode 4 but Rogue and this one had new story lines and not bad either. Don't get me wrong it was no Thrawn trillog but for Disney writers not bad at all i really enjoyed it. Just hope you can up your game in the future maybe even consider some of the great stories already out there for the quality the subject matter truly deserves Disney think about it?
